frontmatter.title: OpenShift Platform Reference Architecture

internal.content:
---
title: OpenShift Platform Reference Architecture
description: Discover capabilities and building blocks of the enterprise container platform
---

### Introduction

The OpenShift Container Platform is a complete container application platform that provides all aspects of the
application development process in one consistent solution across multiple infrastructure footprints.

MdxNode.rawBody:
---
title: OpenShift Platform Reference Architecture
description: Discover capabilities and building blocks of the enterprise container platform
---

### Introduction

The OpenShift Container Platform is a complete container application platform that provides all aspects of the
application development process in one consistent solution across multiple infrastructure footprints.
